VirtualCXLSwitch.description: The Virtual CXL Switch describes the virtual component with the CXL switch that is governed by a list of rules as prescribed in the CXL specification.
VirtualCXLSwitch.longDescription: This resource shall represent a VCS entity within a CXL switch.  The CXL Specification contains the complete definition of a Virtual CXL Switch.

title: #VirtualCXLSwitch.VirtualCXLSwitch
